title: Chandrika Pink Zircon Jhumkas - A Floral Cascade of Elegance
materials: Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance and durability.
features: Exquisitely designed jhumkas featuring a cascading floral motif. The top portion showcases a delicate cluster of pink zircons and shimmering CZ stones, leading to a grand chandelier design. Meticulously set stones in a pav√© setting enhance the overall sparkle. The design is inspired by the traditional temple jewelry of South India, updated with a modern sensibility.
colors: Dominant pink hues from the Zircon stones
complemented by the warm golden tones of the 22K gold plated alloy and the sparkling brilliance of the clear CZ stones. A perfect blend of feminine pink and classic gold.
occasions: or to add a touch of glamour to any special occasion. Ideal for both traditional attire like sarees and lehengas
description: These Chandrika Jhumkas are a fusion of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The high-quality pink zircons offer a unique and captivating sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish ensures longevity and maintains its brilliance. The intricate design and meticulous craftsmanship make these jhumkas a timeless investment.
